data.text: Yahweh showed me another vision. In the vision, I saw him standing next to the altar. He said,
If they dig deep pits in the ground,
If they go to the top of Carmel Mountain to escape,
If their enemies capture them and force them to go to other countries,
When the Commander of the armies of angels touches the earth, it melts,
He builds his beautiful palace in heaven,
And Yahweh says, “You people of Israel,
I [SYN], Yahweh the Lord, have seen that you people in the kingdom of Israel are very sinful,
When I command it, it will be as though I will shake you Israeli people who are living in various nations,
“The kingdom over which King David ruled has been destroyed, like [MET] a house that collapsed and then became ruins.
When that happens, your armies will seize/capture the remaining part of Edom region again,
There will be a time when your crops will grow very well.
I will cause you, my Israeli people, to prosper again.
I will enable you to live [MET] in your land again,
